p: Virus isolation was attempted from DENV-2 RNA positive samples where a suitable amount of material was available ( n = 3) in Vero E6 (ATCC CRL-1586) and C6/36 Aedes albopictus cells (ATCC CRL-1660) as described previously [ 30]. In brief 50Î¼l of sera was inoculated to cells grown in 25cm 2 culture bottles.
